title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel
body: I have tried literally everything i could to try to fix it but nothing has worked....... please help

replies.body:
Hey there!  Most common reasons I see for this would be issues with systems permissions or potentially errors in the game files.

I'm not sure what you've tried already, but I recommend giving our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434) article a once-over and seeing if that helps!
i tried forcing a patch and it worked one time but the problem came back. And now none of the things work to fix it

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eEE6E8gN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-29T21:20:00.249+0000)
>
> Hey there!  Most common reasons I see for this would be issues with systems permissions or potentially errors in the game files.
> 
> I'm not sure what you've tried already, but I recommend giving our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434) article a once-over and seeing if that helps!

so tired of you piece of shit lazy employees copy pasting the same old shit. 6 year old client and still the same problems. You never care to address them. You would rather keep copy pasting your paying customers to a fucking thread that's 5 years old.
Could you not get into a game?
